attributes.action: Abolish the new qualifications for adult education lecturers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We call on the Prime Minister to abolish, and not replace, the new qualifications for adult education lecturers (known as PTLLS, CTLLS and DTLLS) because they have minimal useful content, are administered in an obsessively box-ticking way, insult the intelligence of lecturers, will deter new lecturers and are a waste of taxpayers' money.
